title: What is the Hawaii 5-0 typeface?
content:
Can anyone help identify this typeface, or recommend something similar?

[http://mauialmanac.com/wp-content/uploads/2008/02/5-0.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021183243/http:/mauialmanac.com/wp-content/uploads/2008/02/5-0.jpg "http://mauialmanac.com/wp-content/uploads/2008/02/5-0.jpg")
author: Fantômas

comments.content: It was probably custom, but it reminds me of [Folio Extra Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021183243/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/folio/extra-bold/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D66%26w%3D720%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DHawaii%2520Five-0%25C2%25A0%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dot.liga%26seed%3D34). If you enlarge the caps, change the dots to ovals, and alter the "w" a bit, you will be pretty close.
Thank you Mark! How are things going in your neck of the woods?
